text:
Pallavi Sharda (born 5 March 1990) is an Australian-Indian actress. She has worked in Hindi movies like "My Name Is Khan", "Dus Tola", "Besharam", "Hawaizaada" and "Begum Jaan".
In 2016, she starred as Prama in the 2016 movie "Lion".
Sharda was born in Perth, but was raised in Melbourne. She later moved to Mumbai for her Bollywood career.
